ml

Class OpenNlpMaxentModelImplementation

  • java.lang.Object
    • ml.OpenNlpMaxentModelImplementation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RealizeMaxentModel

    public abstract class OpenNlpMaxentModelImplementation
extends Object
    An implementation of a maximum entropy model based on the GISModel class from OpenNLP.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected FeatureManager featureManager
      The feature manager used by this model, see FeatureManager
      AutoLoadParams params
      The autoload params used by this model, see AutoLoadParams

      OpenNlpMaxentModelImplementation()

      List<Prediction> getNBestSorted(String[] context)
      Returns the n-best predictions (where n is determined by AutoLoadParams.takeBestN) given a feature vector.

      Returns the n-best predictions such that the score of no prediction is below the maximum score minus maxProbDifference, given a feature vector.

    • Method Detail

      • toEvents

        public abstract List<opennlp.tools.ml.model.Event> toEvents(Amr amr,
                                                            Vertex vertex,
                                                            boolean forTesting)
        Extracts from a vertex of an AMR graph a list of feature vectors with outcomes, represented by the Event class.
        Parameters:
        amr - the AMR graph
        vertex - the vertex
        forTesting - if the feature vector and the outcome should be the gold feature vector and the gold outcome, set this to false. Otherwise, if the feature vector should be computed for testing, set this to true.
        Returns:
        the list of events

      • autoLoad

        public void autoLoad(AutoLoadParams params,
                     String filename,
                     boolean train)
              throws IOException
        Automatically loads this maximum entropy model using the parameters specified by an instance of AutoLoadParams
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters to use for loading the model
        filename - the file name under which the model can be found
        train - whether the model should be (re)trained or left as is
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getNBestSorted

        public List<Prediction> getNBestSorted(String[] context)
        Returns the n-best predictions (where n is determined by AutoLoadParams.takeBestN) given a feature vector.
        Parameters:
        context - the feature vector, represented by a String array
        Returns:
        the list of predictions

      • getNBestSorted

        public List<Prediction> getNBestSorted(String[] context,
                                       int n,
                                       double maxProbDifference)
        Returns the n-best predictions such that the score of no prediction is below the maximum score minus maxProbDifference, given a feature vector.
        Parameters:
        context - the feature vector, represented by a String array
        n - the maximum number of predictions
        maxProbDifference - the threshold, the score of no returned prediction is below the maximum score minus this threshold.
        Returns:
        the list of predictions
